title: Okami HD + CrackFix
body:
Okami HD + CrackFix


Genres/Tags: Action, Third-person, 3D, Japanese
Companies: Clover Studio / Capcom
Languages: ENG/MULTI4
Original Size: 21.3 GB
Repack Size: from 3.9 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / LATER KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only] MULTi4
  • FreeTorrents ENG/JAP Only
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] ENG/JAP Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2] MULTi4
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors) MULTi4
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, NOT compatible with other mirrors) MULTi4

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on OKAMI.HD-CODEX ISO release: codex-okami.hd.iso (22,914,564,096 bytes)
  • OKAMI.HD.Crackfix-CODEX applied over
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of language and video files you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 21.3 to 3.9~19.8 GB, depending on selected languages)
  • Installation takes 5-10 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 27 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Experience the critically acclaimed masterpiece with its renowned Sumi-e ink art style in breathtaking high resolution. Take on the role of Amaterasu, the Japanese sun goddess who inhabits the form of a legendary white wolf, on a quest to defeat Orochi, an eight-headed demon and tyrannical monster responsible for turning the world of Nippon into a ruined wasteland.

Players will be able to choose between modern widescreen format or the original release’s 4:3 ratio. Interactive loading game screens from the original game are also included.

You can skip downloading of language and video files you don’t need. By default game installs with English only and 720p videos only. Here is the list of optional files:

  • fg-optional-japanese.bin
  • fg-optional-french.bin
  • fg-optional-german.bin
  • fg-optional-2k-videos-english.bin (also must be installed for other languages too if you need 2K videos)
  • fg-optional-2k-videos-french.bin
  • fg-optional-2k-videos-german.bin
  • fg-optional-2k-videos-japanese.bin
  • fg-optional-4k-videos-english.bin (also must be installed for other languages too if you need 2K videos)
  • fg-optional-4k-videos-french.bin
  • fg-optional-4k-videos-german.bin
  • fg-optional-4k-videos-japanese.bin
  • fg-optional-credits.bin (credits video in low resolution)
